faq.heading: Your Questions Answered
faq.description: Explore answers to common queries regarding AI Eraser

items.title: What types of elements can AI Eraser remove?
items.description: The AI Eraser can effectively remove a variety of distractions like people, logos, text, shadows, and even complex objects like power lines or reflections, intelligently filling in backgrounds seamlessly.

items.title: Is there a fee for using AI Eraser?
items.description: Absolutely! Each user receives 30 free credits daily, allowing multiple images to be processed without charge. Earn extra credits through daily challenges or by engaging in user surveys.

items.title: Can I use the edited images for commercial purposes?
items.description: Yes! Paid users can use edited images for commercial projects. Free-tier users may use them for personal projects only, adhering to outlined restrictions.

items.title: How does AI Eraser ensure privacy?
items.description: All image processing occurs in your browser using WebAssembly and JavaScript, ensuring that your photos are never uploaded or stored on our servers, thus guaranteeing complete privacy.

footer.heading: Ready to Clean Up Your Photos?
footer.description: Start using AI Eraser today and witness the transformation. No sign-up needed.
